<title level="1" right="Rules">[Number Encounter Areas](/Rules.aspx?ID=992)</title>

**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 52

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
The next step is to number the encounter areas. You can then use that numbering system in your encounter notes. If you are designing multiple sites, or many levels of a massive dungeon, consider adding a letter designation before your numbering. The first area of your first site can be A1, while the first area of your next site can be B1, and so on.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
